ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Picture of the Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I take screen shots using the minus ( - ) key on the number pad. But I m not sure what you mean by newer version . The LoY expansion? I don t have that yet,
ygData.messageBody:
I take screen shots using the minus ( - ) key on the number pad. But I'm not sure what you mean by "newer version". The LoY expansion? I don't have that yet, so maybe that has something to do with it...

 "John D Pennington, III <edward001@...>" <edward001@...> wrote:

It seems that the newer version of Everquest no longer allows screen
saves. Can anyone recommend a way to save the screens anyway? Is
there a screen saver that is known to work with the game? I want to
take some pictures of my kitties. G.

Edward
